Bash(python3 -c "
from PIL import Image
import io

# Open the logo
img = Image.open\(''logo.jpg''\)

# Create sizes for ICO \(16, 32, 48\)
sizes = [\(16, 16\), \(32, 32\), \(48, 48\)]

# Save as ICO with multiple sizes
img.save\(''favicon.ico'', format=''ICO'', sizes=sizes\)
print\(''Created favicon.ico successfully''\)
")
Bash(xargs -0 -I {} sh -c 'if grep -A5 ""class=\\""nav-links\\"""" ""{}"" | grep -q ""Case Studies""; then echo ""{} still has nav link""; fi')
Bash(then echo "$file still has nav case-studies link")
